feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.14
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Makes container name narrower on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3853 (e8d8b)
  • Updates dozzle logos and favicons  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3858 (b961b) Shoutout to @iamdabe for the better logo üéâ üöÄ

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3864 (2add1)
  • Update dependency daisyui to v5.0.35  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3869 (8e074)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.15
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add Dutch Translation (I18N) Support  -  by @homelab-alpha in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3872 (68ca6)
  • Localizes distance time  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3874 (9c704)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • I18n for no-logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3873 (71174)
  • Improves translations  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3876 (7a070)
  • deps:
  • Update module github.com/puzpuzpuz/xsync/v4 to v4.1.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3870 (7941b)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3877 (56192)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.16
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds option to instantly redirect to new container  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3897 (fd663)
  • i18n: Add Indonesian translation  -  by @itsmefdil in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3884 (daa02)

   üêû Bug Fixes

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.17
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Uses colored meters instead of progress bar for homepage  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3908 (0c906)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes url pattern matcher with quotes  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3902 (80419)
  • Fixes search and urls in detail panel  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3907 (b70c2)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3910 (7f936)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.18
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a button to fetch logs when skipping happens  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3920 (f6f1b)
  • Adds support for settings page and adds links to github  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3922 (4c2b4)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes logfmt in details  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3912 (2aad1)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency vue-i18n to ^11.1.4  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3914 (defab)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3919 (cfe72)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3921 (aeada)
